usage_rules.headings: Use Chivo for all h1-h3. Weight: 900 for Hero, 700 for Section Headers. Tracking: -0.02em.
usage_rules.body: Use Inter for all UI text. Weight: 400 regular, 500 for labels. Tracking: normal.
usage_rules.mono: Use JetBrains Mono for all data values, regex patterns, and IDs. Text-xs or Text-sm.

structure.dashboard: Grid: 1col (mobile) -> 4col (desktop). Top row: Scorecards. Middle: Main Content. Bottom: History.

buttons.style: Sharp corners or small radius (rounded-md). No pill shapes.
buttons.secondary: bg-white border border-input hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground shadow-sm

cards.style: Flat, 1px border (border-border), bg-card. No heavy shadows. Minimalist.

upload_zone.style: Dashed border-2 border-dashed border-slate-300 bg-slate-50/50 hover:bg-blue-50/50 hover:border-blue-400 transition-all duration-300 rounded-xl p-12 text-center cursor-pointer group

tables.style: Dense. Text-sm. Sticky header. Row hover: bg-slate-50.
tables.header: bg-white border-b border-slate-200 font-semibold text-slate-900 uppercase tracking-wider text-xs

status_badges.pass: bg-emerald-100 text-emerald-700 border border-emerald-200 px-2 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-medium
status_badges.fail: bg-red-100 text-red-700 border border-red-200 px-2 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-medium
status_badges.warning: bg-amber-100 text-amber-700 border border-amber-200 px-2 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-medium

visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle noise overlay on the main background (opacity 0.02) to reduce digital flatness.
visual_enhancers.shadows: shadow-sm for cards. shadow-md for dropdowns/modals. No large diffuse shadows.
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use only for sticky headers: bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-md border-b border-slate-200/50.

motion.page_transition: initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 10 }} animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }} exit={{ opacity: 0, y: -10 }}

assets.icons: Lucide React (standard). Use stroke-width={1.5} for a refined look.

images.description: Subtle blue concrete texture for upload zone background (use with low opacity)
images.usage: Apply as background-image on the Upload Zone container with opacity-5 mix-blend-overlay

accessibility.contrast: Ensure all text is Slate-600 or darker on white backgrounds.
accessibility.aria: All interactive elements must have aria-labels if no text is present.

universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for backgrounds. Keep it flat and clean.
Spacing should be generous (p-8+) in containers, but dense (p-2) in data tables.
instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Install 'framer-motion', 'clsx', 'tailwind-merge', 'sonner'. 2. Update 'index.css' with the provided CSS variables. 3. Create a 'Layout' component that enforces the max-width and padding. 4. Build the 'UploadZone' component with the drag-and-drop logic and the texture background. 5. Implement the 'DQRulesTable' with the dense style.
